entities.name: gilderoy lockhart
entities.description: Professor Gilderoy Lockhart is mentioned as the one who will be working with the Mandrakes. He is described as a person who will be affected by the Mandrake's cries.

entities.name: professor sprout
entities.description: Professor Sprout is mentioned as the one who takes care of the Mandrakes and explains how to handle them safely. She is described as a person who is calm and experienced in handling magical plants.

entities.name: mandrake
entities.description: The Mandrake is mentioned as a magical plant that has the ability to knock people out with its cries. It is described as being buried in compost and having leaves growing out of it.

entities.name: earmuffs
entities.description: Earmuffs are mentioned as a necessary object for protecting oneself from the Mandrake's cries. They are described as something that needs to be securely in place while working with the Mandrakes.

entities.name: table
entities.description: The table is mentioned as a location where Professor Sprout finds a plant pot under it. It is not further described or explained.
